content: single_crochet do not finish round fo with tail for sewing to body pony body worked from front to back rnd1 chain 2 single_crochet 6 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 6 in ml 6 sts rnd2 increase 6x 12 sts rnd3 increase single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 6x 18 sts rnd4-6 3 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 sts pony crochet pattern janageek on ravelry com 16 31 06/09/20 page 3 of 8 rnd7 decrease single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat 3x 15 sts rnd8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15 sts rnd9 increase single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat 3x 18 sts rnd10 increase single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat 3x 21 sts rnd11-12 2 rounds single_crochet in each single_crochet around 21 sts rnd13 decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat 3x 18 sts rnd14 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 6x 12 sts stuff the body rnd15 decrease 6x 6 sts fo with tail with needle and tail sew in front loops of last 6 sts cinch hole closed secure and hide end inside body pony neck worked from top down rnd1 chain 2 single_crochet 6 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 6 in ml 6 sts rnd2 increase 6x 12 sts rnd3 in blo single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts rnd4 in both loops single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts rnd5 increase 4x slip_stitch in next single_crochet do not finish round fo with tail for sewing to body stuff the neck pin neck to body turning the increases in neck rnd5 toward front of body with increases overlapping body rnd2 with needle and tail sew neck to body with about 12 stitches pinkie pie tail with hot pink chain 22 in 5th chain from hook tc 3 tc 4 in next chain repeat in each chain to 2nd to last chain half_double_crochet single_crochet and slip_stitch in last chain fo with tail for sewing sew end of tail to bottom of body pinkie pie mane make same as tail sew to back of head pinkie pie forelock with hot pink yarn chain 10 in 4th chain from hook tc 3 tc 4 in next chain repeat in each chain to 2nd to last chain half_double_crochet single_crochet and slip_stitch in last chain fo with tail for sewing sew end of forelock to head between ears applejack hat rnd1 with light brown chain 2 single_crochet 6 in 2nd chain from hook or single_crochet 6 in ml 6 sts rnd2 increase 6x 12 sts rnd3 increase single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat 6x 18 sts rnd4 in blo single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 sts rnd5 in both loops single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 sts rnd6 increase single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat 3x 21 sts rnd7 in flo increase single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat 7x 28 sts chain 1 turn rnd8 increase single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat 6x increase single_crochet in next single_crochet do not finish round 33 sts chain 1 turn rnd9
